blocks.name: eluzge0nn0
blocks.content: If an integer is greater than or equal to a nonnegative integer, then it is a nonnegative integer. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm eluzge0nn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cn0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cn0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  eluz2(c0, c1)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  sylanbrc(wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  simpl2(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  3imp1(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  ex(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wi(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))))
  expcomd(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), w3a(wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz), w3a(wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c1)
  zre(c0)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  0red(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)))
  simpl(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  simpr(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  letr(nat0, c1, c0)
  elnn0z(c0)
}
